title: New: Jorja Smith – Beautiful Little Fools
body:
British soul sensation Jorja Smith celebrates International Women’s with a stunning video for _Beautiful Little Fools_.

Both the song and video take inspiration from F. Scott Fitzgerald’s  The Great Gatsby with Jorja directly quoting Daisy Buchanan for the songs title. Discussing young women’s destinies often being defined and restricted by societies restrictions and social constructs Jorja seeks to inspire women of all walks of life to be more than “beautiful little fools”. Jorja’s gorgeous voice spreads the message and shines over the songs smooth neo-soul backdrop. Check out the songs stunning new video below.
